title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Skills: STEM-Computational Thinking Integration Education for Special Education Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Special education teachers can apply at least three customized instructional strategies by disability type when designing STEM-computational thinking integrated lessons.
Using collaborative digital pedagogy, teachers co-develop at least two disability-friendly STEM lesson materials with peer teachers.
Through experiential learning-based projects, learners propose solutions to improve the participation rates of visually/hearing-impaired students by over 20%.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
